recommendations.title: Migrate PostgreSQL to Open-source
recommendations.description: Migrate PostgreSQL to an open-source alternative like PostgreSQL Community Server.
steps: Assess the current PostgreSQL setup and identify potential issues.
Migrate the database to the open-source alternative.
Test and validate the migration.

recommendations.title: Right-size Node.js
recommendations.description: Right-size the Node.js environment by optimizing instance types and scaling.
steps: Assess the current Node.js setup and identify potential areas for optimization.
Right-size the instance types and scaling.
Test and validate the changes.

recommendations.title: Use OpenText for Image Storage
recommendations.description: Use OpenText for image storage instead of object storage.
steps: Assess the current object storage setup and identify potential issues.
Migrate the image storage to OpenText.
Test and validate the migration.

recommendations.title: Optimize Basic Analytics
recommendations.description: Optimize the basic analytics setup by reducing data retention and sampling.
steps: Assess the current analytics setup and identify potential areas for optimization.
Reduce data retention and sampling.
Test and validate the changes.

recommendations.title: Use Free Tier for Logging
recommendations.description: Use the free tier for logging instead of paying for it.
steps: Assess the current logging setup and identify potential areas for cost reduction.
Switch to the free tier for logging.
Test and validate the changes.
